attributes.action: If 3% tax on Google is a success, then we should all be paying it.
attributes.background: George Osborne has declared the £130million they have received from Google a huge success.  David Cameron has backed him and refused to answer any further questions on the matter in Prime Minister's Question time. Why should we pay more than Google?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it does not call for clear action. 

We could, however, accept a petition calling for corporation tax or income tax to be reduced to 3%.  If you redrafted and resubmitted the petition we would consider it.
